rukus.text: wa-idh akhadha l-lahu mithaqa l-nabiyina lama ataytukum min kitabin wahik'matin thumma jaakum rasulun musaddiqun lima maʿakum latu'minunna bihi walatansurunnahu qala a-aqrartum wa-akhadhtum ʿala dhalikum is'ri qalu aqrarna qala fa-ish'hadu wa-ana maʿakum mina l-shahidina
faman tawalla baʿda dhalika fa-ulaika humu l-fasiquna
afaghayra dini l-lahi yabghuna walahu aslama man fi l-samawati wal-ardi tawʿan wakarhan wa-ilayhi yur'jaʿuna

qul amanna bil-lahi wama unzila ʿalayna wama unzila ʿala ib'rahima wa-is'maʿila wa-is'haqa wayaʿquba wal-asbati wama utiya musa waʿisa wal-nabiyuna min rabbihim la nufarriqu bayna ahadin min'hum wanahnu lahu mus'limuna
waman yabtaghi ghayra l-is'lami dinan falan yuq'bala min'hu wahuwa fi l-akhirati mina l-khasirina
kayfa yahdi l-lahu qawman kafaru baʿda imanihim washahidu anna l-rasula haqqun wajaahumu l-bayinatu wal-lahu la yahdi l-qawma l-zalimina
ulaika jazauhum anna ʿalayhim laʿnata l-lahi wal-malaikati wal-nasi ajmaʿina
khalidina fiha la yukhaffafu ʿanhumu l-ʿadhabu wala hum yunzaruna
illa alladhina tabu min baʿdi dhalika wa-aslahu fa-inna l-laha ghafurun rahimun
inna alladhina kafaru baʿda imanihim thumma iz'dadu kuf'ran lan tuq'bala tawbatuhum wa-ulaika humu l-daluna
inna alladhina kafaru wamatu wahum kuffarun falan yuq'bala min ahadihim mil'u l-ardi dhahaban walawi if'tada bihi ulaika lahum ʿadhabun alimun wama lahum min nasirina
